name: My Little Pony: Rainbow Roadtrip
summary:
My Little Pony: Rainbow Roadtrip is a 2019 Irish–American one-hour television special based on the animated television series My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic. Unlike Friendship Is Magic, it was not produced by DHX Studios Vancouver, instead by Boulder Media Limited in Ireland.
The special aired on Discovery Family on June 29, 2019.
